attributes.action: recognise that london is not the only city worth a damn in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why does the whole of the U.K.have to endure time and time again london being rammed down our throats as the only suitable city in the U.K. to be put forward as the host city for for major events.....???????
i.e..THE OLYMPICS,WORLD CUP,there are far more less congested cities in the U.K.and prettier than London..or are the Government trying to create a state within a state and no other city matters????
